title: CSV Parser with Type Conversion
description: Implement a function that parses CSV content into structured data with automatic type conversion. The parser should handle headers, convert numeric values, handle quoted fields, and return a list of dictionaries.
requirements: Takes CSV string content as input parameter
Returns list of dictionaries (one per row)
First row treated as headers (dictionary keys)
Automatically convert numeric strings to int or float
Handle quoted fields with commas inside
Return empty list for empty input or header-only CSV

few_shot_examples.prompt: Implement a function that splits a string by a delimiter and returns a list.
few_shot_examples.code:
def split_string(text: str, delimiter: str) -> list[str]:
    return text.split(delimiter)

few_shot_examples.prompt: Implement a function that converts a string to int or float if possible.
Implement a function that parses key-value pairs from a string.
